actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

actions.subcommittee: SBA, the General Economy, and Minority Enterprise Development
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on SBA, the General Economy, and Minority Enterprise Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA, the General Economy and Minority Enterprise Development

official_title: To amend the Small Business Act to make small business concerns owned and controlled by special disabled veterans eligible to receive procurement contracts awards under that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to provide that small business concerns owned and controlled by special disabled veterans are eligible to receive procurement contract awards.

titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to make small business concerns owned and controlled by special disabled veterans eligible to receive procurement contracts awards under that Act.
